structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Actions By And Against Executors And Administrators

law.catch_line: Accounting For Property Returned Pursuant To Judgment
law.text: If judgment for a return of property is rendered in a civil action against an executor or administrator, the property returned by him shall not be assets in his hands; and if it has been included in the inventory, he shall be allowed therefor in his account if he shows that it has been returned in pursuance of such judgment.
